furniture.Mannequin.name: Mannequin
furniture.Mannequin.description: A mannequin used to put together beautiful gowns.
furniture.MannequinContrastParallel.name: Contrast Parallel Mannequin
furniture.MannequinContrastParallel.desc: Indigo iridescent silk jersey with pearlescent stripe detailing and asymmetrical zip collar, and apricot capris. Part of Emily's Chromatic Measure Collection.
furniture.MannequinMedianTincture.name: Median Tincture Mannequin
furniture.MannequinMedianTincture.descri: Natural undyed wool tunic with tangerine wool collar, cuffs, and hems beaded in malachite and sea-glass, with turquoise satin slacks. Part of Emily's Chromatic Measure Collection.
furniture.MannequinSaturatedRatio.name: Saturated Ratio Mannequin
furniture.MannequinSaturatedRatio.descri: Violet recycled fleece hoodie with asymmetrical zip and hem and rainbow fabric collage sleeves, and cobalt jeans with step hems. Part of Emily's Chromatic Measure Collection.
furniture.MannequinSunflowerVision.name: Sunflower Vision Mannequin
furniture.MannequinSunflowerVision.descr: Umber sequined crochet strapless slip and marble-dyed marigold silk open robe with bell sleeves. Part of Emily's Verdant Dreamer Collection.
furniture.MannequinMeadowReverie.name: Meadow Reverie Mannequin
furniture.MannequinMeadowReverie.descrip: Peach pebbled mushroom-leather bolero and mint chiffon high-low empire waist gown with floral embroidery. Part of Emily's Verdant Dreamer Collection.
furniture.MannequinPlumFantasy.name: Plum Fantasy Mannequin
furniture.MannequinPlumFantasy.descripti: Violet and magenta paisley taffeta peplum dress with gold applique chrysanthemum shoulder detailing and half-float collar. Part of Emily's Verdant Dreamer Collection.
furniture.MannequinLissomeBlaze.name: Lissome Blaze Mannequin
furniture.MannequinLissomeBlaze.descript: Vermillion plunge bodycon dress with lapels and gold starburst embroidery, and tuscan yellow bandeau. Part of Emily's Elemental Danseuse Collection.
furniture.MannequinGracefulZephyr.name: Graceful Zephyr Mannequin
furniture.MannequinGracefulZephyr.descri: Pearl chiffon jumpsuit with attached double scarf and lavender linen jacket with epaulettes and three-quarter sleeves. Part of Emily's Elemental Danseuse Collection.
furniture.MannequinAquaticElegance.name: Aquatic Elegance Mannequin
furniture.MannequinAquaticElegance.descr: Off-the-shoulder turquoise satin mermaid dress with azure sequin bodice detailing and attached floor-length cape with silver foam embroidery & seed pearls. Part of Emily's Elemental Danseuse Collection.
furniture.MannequinProfessionalByways.de: Cotton-blend tan jacket and tank top undershirt, with high-waisted golden-brown capris. Part of Emily's Urban Catwalk Collection.
furniture.MannequinNaturalBustle.name: Natural Bustle Mannequin
furniture.MannequinNaturalBustle.descrip: Olive twill weave overcoat with jet abstract animal iconography, and charcoal denim shirt with loose hazelnut-brown cotton trousers. Part of Emily's Urban Catwalk Collection.
furniture.MannequinCapriciousSkylines.de: Cream flocked wool jacket with hand-embroidered fire-and-ice motif, beige turtleneck collar crop-top, and chambray jeans. Part of Emily's Urban Catwalk Collection.
furniture.PedestalCourtains.name: Pedestal Curtains
furniture.PedestalCourtains.description: Luscious curtains made out of expensive-feeling silk.
furniture.PedestalPedestal.name: Pedestal
furniture.PedestalPedestal.description: A small pedestal for people trying on clothes to feel special on.
furniture.SewingTable.name: Sewing Table
furniture.SewingTable.description: A table with everything a seamstress or tailor could use for their work.
